Title: Three Quarter Sleeves Mother of the Bride Dress

----

Bulkdiscount: 0

----

Sizes: 22, 8, 16, 6, 10, 18, 14, 12, 20

----

Colors: black, royal

----

Category: evening

----

Featured-image: C288-black-three-quarter-sleeves-mother-of-the-bride-dress_p.jpg

----

Description: Classical mother of the bride gown with scalloped neckline and lace applique on the neckline and cuffs. Three quarter length sleeves complement the ruched bodice and waistline. The back of the bodice features a deep V and trains at the floor.
